wysiwyg_a.p: This function block passes events of one input to one of two selectable event outputs.

wysiwyg.p: If the 'G'-input is FALSE then all events from 'EI' are passed to the 'EO0'-Event output, else all events are passed to the 'EO1'-Event output.
The status of the 'G'-input selects to which event output the incoming event is passed.
